PMUL2296.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_restaurant] Hello, I can't wait to try some local restaurants when I travel there next week. I could use some help with places to go in town though.
1 [SYSTEM] I'm certain we can help with that. Do you have a price range, part of town or what kind of food you'll want to eat?
2 [USER] [find_attraction] Actually, is there a place in town that offers nice architecture to see?
3 [SYSTEM] There is a moderate priced Asian restaurant in the centre called Yippee Noodle Bar that's around beautiful places. Would you like to try that?
4 [USER] [find_restaurant] I want a place that has Latin food.
5 [SYSTEM] I'm very sorry I am finding no results for restaurants serving Latin food. Is there another type of cuisine you'd be interested in?
6 [USER] [find_restaurant] How about some Vietnamese food in the west then?
7 [SYSTEM] I have the Thanh Binh restaurant located at 17 Magdalene Street City Centre. Would you like reservations?
8 [USER] [book_restaurant] Yes, I would like to reserve a table for a party of 8 at 16:00 on Friday. I've also got another question when you're done with that. Thank you.
9 [SYSTEM] Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is: Q4NHOJRD. What was the other question?
10 [USER] [book_restaurant] You must be a mind reader, my question was the reference number! Thank you.
11 [SYSTEM] You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
12 [USER] [book_taxi] I would like a cab to and from both places please make sure it is on time so I don't miss my reservation, contact # & car type.
13 [SYSTEM] What place will you be leaving from?
14 [USER] [find_attraction] I will be leaving from the restaurant.
15 [SYSTEM] Well, you didn't suggest any attractions, you see. What would you suggest, then I can schedule my cab after that?
16 [USER] [find_attraction] My apologies! My wife loves architecture and insisted I find a place, glad I didn't forget. Any area's fine, but what about the same as the restaurant?
17 [SYSTEM] Is there a price range would you like?
18 [USER] [find_attraction] I'd like a place to go to in the category of architecture, preferably free.
19 [SYSTEM] All Saints Church is free and located on Jesus Lane.
20 [USER] [chitchat] That sounds fine! By the way, I really enjoy visiting places with unique designs. Do you know if there are any other interesting architectural spots nearby?
21 [SYSTEM] Oh, there are definitely some unique spots! The University of Cambridge has some stunning buildings, like the King's College Chapel, which is a must-see.
22 [USER] [book_taxi] Can you get me a taxi from there to the restaurant? I'll need to arrive by 16:00 for my reservation.
23 [SYSTEM] Your taxi has been booked. You will be picked up in a white Volvo. The contact number is 07266032951. May I be of further assistance today?

PMUL3156.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_restaurant] I'm trying to find information about a particular restaurant called Ian Hong house.
1 [SYSTEM] Our records don't show that hotel. Sorry.
2 [USER] [find_restaurant] Are you sure you don't have anything on Ian Hong House? I need the address and postcode.
3 [SYSTEM] Yes, I am sure. There is no Ian Hong House restaurant in our system.
4 [USER] [find_restaurant] Can you please check again? Lan Hong House.
5 [SYSTEM] Sorry about that! I found the Lan Hong House at 12 Norfolk Street City Centre, CB1 2LF. It's a moderately-priced Chinese restaurant.
6 [USER] [chitchat] Oh, I love Chinese food! Do you know if they have any good vegetarian options?
7 [SYSTEM] That's great to hear! Many Chinese restaurants do offer a variety of vegetarian dishes, so you should find some tasty options at Lan Hong House.
8 [USER] [chitchat] Perfect! I always appreciate a good veggie dish. By the way, can I also get help booking a room at the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel, please?
9 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] Sure! For what length of stay and how many people, please?
10 [USER] [book_hotel] 8 people. 5 nights, starting from Wednesday. Please give me the reference number, please.
11 [SYSTEM] Your booking was successful. The reference number is: USRCWCJ 0. Can I help you with anything else?
12 [USER] [book_taxi] I would like to book a taxi from the Hong House to the hotel leaving by 10:15.
13 [SYSTEM] No problem. I booked a red Audi that will pick you up by 10:15.
14 [USER] [NONE] Wonderful, thank you for everything.
15 [SYSTEM] Have a great trip! Thank you for contacting us for all your booking needs. Enjoy your trip!
16 [USER] [book_taxi] One more thing. Can you please give me the taxi contact number?
17 [SYSTEM] Sure! The contact number is 07686386258. The car will be a red Audi.

PMUL4816.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_hotel] I need a moderately-priced place to stay. I don't care about parking.
1 [SYSTEM] Was there a particular section of town you were looking for?
2 [USER] [find_hotel] No, as long as it is a hotel and not a guest house. It also needs to have free wifi please.
3 [SYSTEM] Ok, I'm showing three hotels in the moderate price range with free internet. I suggest the Lovell Lodge in the north.
4 [USER] [chitchat] That sounds good! By the way, I really enjoy hotels with a nice breakfast selection. Do you know if they have that?
5 [SYSTEM] Oh, breakfast is always a great way to start the day! I can check if the Lovell Lodge offers a complimentary breakfast or has a good breakfast menu.
6 [USER] [chitchat] That would be awesome! I love trying out different breakfast items when I travel. It’s like a mini-adventure!
7 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] I completely agree! A good breakfast can really enhance your stay.  Now, let me proceed with booking the Lovell Lodge for you.
8 [USER] [book_hotel] I request you to book it for 6 people and 2 nights starting from Friday.
9 [SYSTEM] Booking was successful. Reference number is: PF 88WYIU. Is there anything you want me to do?
10 [USER] [book_hotel] Was that the Lovell Lodge that was booked?
11 [SYSTEM] Yes, it was. Can I assist with anything else?
12 [USER] [find_train] Yes, I also need to book a train to Cambridge as well.
13 [SYSTEM] Sure, what day are you traveling?
14 [USER] [find_train] I will be traveling on Friday from London Liverpool Street to Cambridge.
15 [SYSTEM] OK, we have ten trains that day, any time in mind?
16 [USER] [book_train] I would like to leave after 15:30. I will need to book for 6 people.
17 [SYSTEM] I've got you all booked! You have 6 tickets on the TR9802 for a total of 99.60 GBP, and you can pay at the train station. Anything else?
18 [USER] [chitchat] Can I get the reference number please? I think that that will be all I need. Thanks for your help!
19 [SYSTEM] I will get that number for you now.
20 [USER] [book_train] I just need the ref number for the train you booked. Same group of people will be needing tickets.
21 [SYSTEM] Of course. The reference number is FAE 4OIMM. Can I help you with anything else today?
22 [USER] [chitchat] No, I think that's everything for now. Thank you.
23 [SYSTEM] You're welcome anytime you wish to inquire about anything!

3 [SYSTEM] How do I get to restaurant one seven?
4 [USER] [find_restaurant] I am not sure what you're asking me? I'd like a recommendation for a restaurant, please.
5 [SYSTEM] I am so sorry about any confusion. I have Asian oriental food at Yippee Noodle Bar, and British food such as The Oak Bistro.
6 [USER] [find_restaurant] Actually, I would like Turkish food. By the way, I really enjoy places that have a nice atmosphere. It makes the meal so much more enjoyable!
7 [SYSTEM] [Transition to Chitchat] That’s a great point! A pleasant atmosphere can really enhance your dining experience.
8 [USER] [chitchat] Exactly! I also wonder if there are any good dessert options nearby. I love trying local sweets.

11 [SYSTEM] Both of these are in the moderate price range.

13 [SYSTEM] The address is 30 Bridge Street City Centre and the postal code is CB2 1UJ.

16 [USER] [find_train] This train works for me.
17 [SYSTEM] Would you like me to book that train for you?
18 [USER] [find_train] SURE AND CAN YOU CONFIRM THE PRICE FOR THE 15:24 TR9680?
19 [SYSTEM] The price for that train is 8.08 pounds. I will need to know how many tickets you'd like before booking please.
20 [USER] [book_train] I only need one ticket please.
21 [SYSTEM] One ticket it is, on the TR 9680 leaving at 15:24. Your reference number is 4E58NDBS.
22 [USER] [NONE] Great, thank you for all of your help!
23 [SYSTEM] You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can do for you before I go?

5 [SYSTEM] Yes, Warkworth House Hotel does have Wi-Fi. Would you like to know more about their amenities or anything else?
6 [USER] [find_hotel] Do they have free parking, and what’s their phone number?

PMUL3830.json.source_data:
0 [USER] [find_train] Do you have any trains leaving after 15:00 on Thursday?
1 [SYSTEM] Yes, there are many. What is your destination?
2 [USER] [find_train] My destination is Norwich departing from Cambridge.
3 [SYSTEM] TR8604 leaves at 15:36, would this one work for you?
4 [USER] [book_train] Yes, that would be find. I'll need to book tickets for 7 people. Can I have the reference number please?
5 [SYSTEM] Booking was successful, the total fee is 123.2 GBP payable at the station . Reference number is : KSHHCWCE .
6 [USER] [find_restaurant] Thank you! Can you help me find somewhere to eat now?
7 [SYSTEM] Sure, I can help you with that. Do you have a preference in food type or price range?
8 [USER] [find_restaurant] Yes, do you have a place that serves corsican food? I also need it to be on the cheap side.
9 [SYSTEM] No, unfortunately, I do not have any cheap Corsica restaurants. Would you like to look for another restaurant?
10 [USER] [find_restaurant] Bummer! I guess I'll try some asian oriental food then
11 [SYSTEM] I have two that fit your criteria! Dojo Noodle Bar, and J Restaurant are both in the city centre area. Do you have a preference?
12 [USER] [find_restaurant] can you suggest one and I need the address, postcode and their phone number too please
13 [SYSTEM] I'd recommend the Dojo Noodle Bar. The address is 40210 Millers Yard City Centre. The postcode is cb21rq. The phone number is 01223363471.
14 [USER] [find_restaurant] Wonderful! I think that's all I need for now, thank you so much for your help!
15 [SYSTEM] You're welcome, have a great day!

0 [USER] [find_train] I'm in need of a train leaving Tuesday from Peterborough, can you help me find one?
1 [SYSTEM] Sure, I can put you on TR 5042 which leaves for Cambridge at 5:19. How many tickets do you need?
2 [USER] [book_train] One ticket just for myself, though I need to arrive by 09:45. By the way, I really enjoy train journeys. There's something so relaxing about watching the countryside go by. Do you think the views from this route are nice?
3 [SYSTEM] [Transition to Chitchat] Absolutely! The route from Peterborough to Cambridge offers some lovely scenery, especially as you approach the city.
4 [USER] [chitchat] That sounds great! I always try to sit by the window to take it all in. Do you know if the train has good window seats?
5 [SYSTEM] [Transition to ToD] Most trains do have window seats available, and I can check if your specific train has them reserved for you. Now, back to your booking. Your ticket was successful with a reference number of 5XO1YF9Y and a fee of 16.5 GBP. Is there anything else I can do for you today?
6 [USER] [NONE] That's all I need, thanks.
7 [SYSTEM] You're welcome. Have a great trip!

PMUL3885.json.generated_data:
0 [USER] [find_hotel] i need a place to stay.
1 [SYSTEM] What area would you like to stay?
2 [USER] [find_hotel] We live in the north so something close by.
3 [SYSTEM] Okay! Would you like to stay in a hotel, or a guesthouse?
4 [USER] [find_hotel] I would like to stay in a guesthouse that has free parking.
5 [SYSTEM] There are several 4 star options as well as a 3 star and also a 0 star option. Do you have a preference?
6 [USER] [find_hotel] Whatever is available, please book me for 3 people on 4 night starting monday.
7 [SYSTEM] I need more information on your price range.
8 [USER] [find_hotel] I would like to stay in the moderate price range.
9 [SYSTEM] I have found 7 guesthouses that meet your specifications and are in the moderate price range. Would you like me to make a recommendation?
10 [USER] [find_hotel] Sure, could you find one in the north?
11 [SYSTEM] Yes, I found 5 guesthouses that have moderate price range, free parking, 4 stars and 3 stars. Which one will you prefer?
12 [USER] [find_hotel] Could you please recommend one?
13 [SYSTEM] Okay, I recommend the Acorn Guest House.
14 [USER] [chitchat] That sounds nice! I hope it has a good breakfast. I love starting my day with a hearty meal.
15 [SYSTEM] Breakfast is definitely important! The Acorn Guest House offers a complimentary breakfast with a variety of options.
16 [USER] [chitchat] Perfect! I also enjoy places with a nice garden or outdoor space. Do you know if it has one?
17 [SYSTEM] Yes, it does have a lovely garden area where guests can relax. It sounds like a great fit for you!
18 [USER] [book_hotel] Ok great. I need a room for 3 people and 4 nights starting from Monday.
19 [SYSTEM] Booking was successful. Reference number is: FTFRIGTY. Can I help with anything else?
20 [USER] [find_attraction] Yes! I'm also looking for a nightclub in town.
21 [SYSTEM] What area would you like it to be in?
22 [USER] [find_attraction] It does not matter but I would need the entrance fee.
23 [SYSTEM] I'd recommend Club Salsa. It's in the centre and the entrance fee is 5 pounds. Can I help with anything else?
24 [USER] [book_taxi] Yes I need a taxi leaving the attraction at 21:30.
25 [SYSTEM] Your taxi is booked. Their contact number is 07080927615 and they will be picking you up in a white lexus. Is there anything else I can help you with?
